analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x282db008df771bc04c8a298d70471bc2d5dc6783.sol:
	Contract WAAMToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x282db008df771bc04c8a298d70471bc2d5dc6783.sol#427)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0x282db008df771bc04c8a298d70471bc2d5dc6783.sol#165-167) is not in mixedCase
